code:
%%{HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
title: SM-02.01 — Contribution Lifecycle (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)

[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine] --> NORMALIZE : ContributionSubmitted
note right of NORMALIZE
  Canonicalize payload (HealthTech_PatientRecords)
  Build canonical contribution hash and refs
end note

NORMALIZE --> SYBIL_CHECK : Normalized
note right of SYBIL_CHECK
  Rate limits, graph heuristics, reputation gates
  Uses PoCI (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine) & Security signals (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
end note

SYBIL_CHECK --> REJECTED : SybilFlagged
SYBIL_CHECK --> VALIDATE : PassedSybilChecks

VALIDATE --> INTAKE_ALIGN : SchemaValid
VALIDATE --> REJECTED : SchemaInvalid
note right of VALIDATE
  JSON Schema, policy guard, size caps
  Required fields present
end note

INTAKE_ALIGN --> SCORE_IMPACT : AlignmentChecked
note right of INTAKE_ALIGN
  Ethics preflight (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)
  Rubric mapping, human/AI adapters
end note

SCORE_IMPACT --> UPDATE_CP : ImpactScored
note right of SCORE_IMPACT
  Map impact to resonance inputs
  Prepare CP increment
end note

UPDATE_CP --> LEDGER : CPUpdated
note right of UPDATE_CP
  W_i = (HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)^alpha with 0 < alpha < 1
  Emit PoC events for Metrics (HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)
end note

LEDGER --> CONFIRMED : LedgerCommitted
note right of LEDGER
  Append-only event store, snapshot policies
  Reconciliation with external oracles (HealthTech_PatientRecords)
end note

%% ---- Exceptions & reviews ----
SCORE_IMPACT --> REVIEW : AnomalyDetected
REVIEW --> CONFIRMED : ClearedByReview
REVIEW --> REJECTED : RejectedByReview

REJECTED --> [HealthTech_PatientRecords]
CONFIRMED --> [HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]

%% =========== Styling ===========
classDef core fill:#ff8b00,stroke:#333,color:#fff,font-weight:bold;
class NORMALIZE,SYBIL_CHECK,VALIDATE,INTAKE_ALIGN,SCORE_IMPACT,UPDATE_CP,LEDGER,REVIEW,REJECTED,CONFIRMED core;
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 接下来是关于 HealthTech_EMR_Sync 和 HealthTech_PatientRecords 的逻辑。
等等，我重新想了一下，应该是 HealthTech_EMR_Sync处理 才对。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'HealthTech_EMR_Sync处理'。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine 和 HealthTech_EMR_Sync。
抱歉，稍微改一下，把刚才那个改成 HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine处理。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine处理'，对吧？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine 和 HealthTech_LabAnalyzer 这一块。
等等，我重新想了一下，应该是 HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine处理 才对。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine处理'？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 HealthTech_PatientRecords 的分支。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'HealthTech_PatientRecords'。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
